instructions.title: Let's Exercise Your Eyes!
instructions.step1: Keep your head still and look at the screen from a comfortable distance.
instructions.step2: Follow the moving target with both eyes. Our sloth friend will help you!
instructions.step3: Complete the 5-minute session for best results. Have fun!

complete.title: Great Job!
complete.message: You've completed an eye exercise session! Regular practice will help strengthen your eye muscles.

sloth.welcome: Hi there! I'm Sammy the Sloth! I'll help you exercise your eyes. Let's have fun!
sloth.start: Click start when you're ready to begin the exercise!
sloth.noEyesDetected: I can't see your eyes yet. Make sure your face is visible to the camera!
sloth.keepGoing: You're doing great! Keep following the target with your eyes!
sloth.almostDone: Almost there! Just a little bit more to go!
sloth.completed: Awesome job! You finished the exercise! Your eyes are getting stronger!
